00017 #ifndef __PTL_UTIL_H__
00018 #define __PTL_UTIL_H__
00019 
00020 
00021 /* Macro for easy free */
00022 #define FREE(x) {if(x) {free(x); x = NULL;}}
00023 
00024 #define GET_LINE(file,line,line_size,str,val,delim,delim2,sp,val_ptr,str_ptr){ fgets(line,(line_size),file); str=strtok_r(line,delim,sp); if(!str){continue;} val=strtok_r(NULL, delim2, sp); str_ptr=strip_whitespace(str); val_ptr=strip_whitespace(val); }
00025 /* strcat that concatenates all the chars it can */
00026 #define STR_CAT(dest,src,max) { if((strlen(dest)+strlen(src)) < max){ strcat(dest,src);} else {strncat(dest,src,(max-(strlen(dest)+strlen(src))));} }
00027 
00028 #define COPY(dest,src,size){ memset(dest,0,size); memcpy(dest,src,size); }
00029 
00030 #define INT_TO_CHAR(num,c){ sprintf(c,"%i", num);  }
00031 
00032 # define TIMEVAL_TO_TIMESPEC(tv, ts) {                                   \
00033         (ts)->tv_sec = (tv)->tv_sec;                                    \
00034         (ts)->tv_nsec = (tv)->tv_usec * 1000;                           \
00035 }
00036 # define TIMESPEC_TO_TIMEVAL(tv, ts) {                                   \
00037         (tv)->tv_sec = (ts)->tv_sec;                                    \
00038         (tv)->tv_usec = (ts)->tv_nsec / 1000;                           \
00039 }
00040 
00041 int ptl_timed_wait(long wait_usec);
00042 void ptl_get_future_time(struct timespec *ts, long usec);
